ALGIERS , May 19 ( Reuters ) - The Algerian state energy firm Sonatrach has ordered its workers back from Libya over security concerns in the neighbouring country , a source at the company said on Monday .

ALGIERS , May 19 ( Reuters ) - The Algerian state energy firm Sonatrach has ordered its workers back from Libya over security concerns in the neighbouring country , a source at the company said on Monday .
Around 50 Sonatrach workers were working in Libya , and all will be out within two days , the source said .
On Friday , Algeria sent a special forces team into Tripoli to evacuate its ambassador and embassy staff following threats .
On Friday , Algeria sent a special forces team into Tripoli to evacuate its ambassador and embassy staff following threats .
Algeria has also imposed restrictions on border crossings , allowing only Algerian citizens to cross from Libya and only Libyan citizens into Libya , a security source said .
